instructions.2: COMBINE enchilada sauce and salsa in medium bowl; mix well. Pour 1 1/2 cups sauce mixture onto bottom of ungreased 13 x 9-inch baking pan.
instructions.3: HEAT tortillas, one at a time, in lightly greased medium skillet over medium heat for 20 seconds on each side or until soft. Place 1 strip cheese and 1 strip chile in center of each tortilla; roll up. Place seam side down in baking pan. Repeat with remaining tortillas, cheese and chiles. Ladle remaining sauce over enchiladas; sprinkle with shredded cheese.
instructions.4: BAKE, covered, for 20 minutes. Remove cover; bake for additional 5 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted.

questions.question: Is oven from Step 1 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 4?
Can we combine (Step 2) and bake (Step 4) at the same time?
